title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Foundational Course in Developing Digital Educational Games

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop a simple game prototype for science education following game-based learning design principles.
Learners can analyze microlearning game interfaces optimized for mobile environments.
Learners can perform basic verification procedures using a quality control checklist for educational game development stages.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
